name: PlayBall
description: Play Ball is a ball game for two people. If the first or second player scores 5 points, the game starts anew. Controls (movement keys of 1 player- W-up, S- down, A- left, D-right; Movement keys of 2 players- O-up, L- down, K- left, ; (Ж) -right; if you press "M", you will go to the menu).
